titles.title: An original resolution authorizing the expenditures by the Committee on Armed Services.

calendar.text: Committee on Armed Services ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Armed Services. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Nunn. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered favorably reported an original resolution (S.Res. 381) in lieu of this measure.

bill.summary: 2/1/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Committee on Armed Services, from March 1, 1988, through February 28, 1989, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; (3) utilize department or agency personnel on a reimbursable basis; (4) procure consultant services; and (5) provide training for its professional staff.
